summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.9°C) and outside temperature (down 2.0°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 799 m) and light levels (up 11901 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 13890 lux), cloud levels (up 1496 m), feels like temperature (up 4.9°C), and outside temperature (up 3.6°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 798.6m lower than yesterday, 605.5m lower than the past week, 1495.7m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 745m and a high of 3580m, averaging 1187.8m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, humidity should not be a concern. Possible light showers, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and low sunlight due to cloudy or overcast skies. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
